item.title: Report X-2025021075
item.description:
Report X-2025021075

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-28T00:58:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-18
  • City: HILLSBORO
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS NEAR SCENE WHEN IT OCCURED. RESPONDER WAS NOTIFIED VIA WORD OF MOUTH BY ANOTHER EMPLOYEE THAT THERE WAS A LEAKER. RESPONDER IMMEDIATELY GRABBED NEAR BY SPILL CART, SUITED UP AND CLEANED UP MESS.
